info.title: Summitto Pilot API Spec
info.description: This is the documentation for the Summitto wallet proxy pilot API. If you would like to participate in the pilot please send a request to pilot@summitto.com. If you already have an account please visit https://access.summitto.com to generate API keys.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Provide your API Key in the format: "Bearer <API_KEY>"
